title: Justice in Africa
description: In this time of racial turbulence comes an epic tale that blurs the lines between black and white; between the truth and what you thought you knew about South Africa. Francois Fouch√© is a white Boer who is sent off to fight a war in Angola where he meets one of the unsung heroes of this legendary conflict. David Malope is a black Zulu warrior who fights on the same side as Francois and his actions will trigger a series of events that leads to a stunning and violent conclusion; to Justice in Africa.
author: Mila French
